transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir Mohit baat kar raha hun India Mart se aapka account manager
Executive: Mohit ji
Customer: Ji ji ji
Executive: Aapka account manager baat kar raha hun 6 November ko aap se video call hui thi jo
Customer: Badiya bataye
Executive: Ha main keh raha tha sir aapne fir se koi aapne India Mart ke app pe aapne fir se koi video call ke liye request kari hai kya ki aapko video call karni hai mere sath
Customer: Hmm
Executive: Kari thi aapne
Customer: Ha abhi dali hai maine request
Executive: Ha to bataiye sir kya ho gaya karu video call karu fir aapko
Customer: Main ye puch raha tha pehle baat karenge
Executive: Achcha
Customer: Ye bataiye
Executive: Ha
Customer: Aapke isme rating ka mamla nahi rehta hai kya
Executive: Rating ka
Customer: Reviews rating
Executive: Ha hota hai
Customer: To bilkul hi reviews rating dekhne ke liye kahan jana padega
Executive: Ah wo sir main aapko aap abhi system pe hai aap apne
Customer: Nahi system pe to nahi hun bataye kaise verbally bataye ek baar
Executive: Achcha ek baar verbally batao to sir verbally mein dekhiye simple hota hai jab aap profile pe jate hain na apni pe
Customer: Ek minute jab aap system pe jayenge ha ha ha
Executive: Fir
Customer: Usme review and rating ka aata hai sir option
Executive: Achcha
Customer: Ha to waha pe aur suniye hota kya hai jab aap kisi bhi client se deal karte hain ya call karte hain ya fir by lead kisi se baat karte hain to waha pe sir ek option aata hai ask for review ka aap un client se sidhe bol sakte hain sir aapke paas ek aapke whatsapp pe message aaya hoga ya jahan se aap hamari baat chal rahi hai waha aapko ek message aa raha hoga hamari rating ke liye to unse bol diya kijiye ki sir aap hame jo bhi aap five stars bola kijiye ki sir aap hame hamari rating badha dijiye aap apne experience ke hisab se hame hamari rating de dijiye chahe aap three star dijiye chahe five star dijiye koshish kijiye koi usme kam na de three to five star ke beech mein hi rahe jisse ki aapka ek achcha good impression padta hai samne wale client pe jaise main unknown hun main aapko nahi janta maine aapki SRF Mewari Infra construction company dekhi maine India Mart ke page pe waha dekhe ki aapko five star mile hue to mera ek aapke prati confidence badh gaya ya fir bol dijiye ek vishwas aa gaya ki five star rated company hai
Customer: To wo asani rehti hai mere liye main aapko call kar saku wahi aapka ek star dikhega ya dedh star dikhega to wo thoda sa rehta hai are yaar matlab ke kahin na kahin doubtful sa rehta hai to isliye aur karna kya hota hai uska simple sa kam hota hai ki aap apne jab client hai jo aapke client hai unse aap bolna padega bolenge aapko na hum de sakte hain na aap khud aap nahi de sakte aapke client hai wahi denge to aap unse jab call kar rahe hain message pe baat kar rahe hain kahin bhi x y z kaise bhi unse baat kar rahe hain to aap unse boliye ki sir hame rating de dijiyega jarur hamara feedback jarur share kijiiyega kyuki jo aapka ho ek do star de rahe ho teen star de rahe ho matlab unse baaton mein ye bol dena hai ki teen se panch ke beech mein to unse bolna mat ki sir ek star do ya do star do unse bolna sir three ke panch ke beech mein aapko jo bhi star hamare kaam ke hisab se aapko dene ho aap hame de sakte hain
Executive: Hmm aap log nahi karate ho
Executive: Nahi kar nahi nahi nahi nahi hum apna aise usme nahi ho sakta koi bhi hum fake rating na ho payegi na main bhi kar na main kar paunga na kahin se koi option hai nahi rating badhane ka aapko simply hai jo aapka customer experience hai jaise main aapki abhi rating dekh raha hun main ek minute ja ke dekh le raha hun kitni chal rahi hai portal pe aapka page open kar leta hun ek second
Executive: Achcha
Executive: Batao
Executive: Usme sari details aati hai kis customer ne aapko kab kaun si date ko kitne star diye sari abhi ek second mein bata raha hun aapko open kar liya maine aapka portal rating and review sir aapko five star mile hue hai abhi tak ek hai koi samna ram karke hai jinhone office interior design service li thi aap se 30 october 2025 matlab abhi 30 october ko jaisalmer rajasthan se wo unhone aapko panch star diye aur aapka total jo dikha raha hai wo aapko five star dikha raha hai abhi aapke usme screenshot main aapko whatsapp bhej do
Customer: Nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi wo to main kar lunga samajh mein aa gaya
Executive: Aapke usme kuch help karte aapki taraf se kuch review rating badhti to maza aata na
Executive: Are sir aise nahi badha sakte sir aap chahe overall India Mart pe kahin pe bhi aap koi bhi se baat kar lijiye matlab hamare managers wagera se unse kar lijiye aisa nahi hota to sir aapko kehne ki jarurat hi nahi padne dete sir hum aapke pehle hi kar dete
Customer: Humko rating hum aapko rating dene mein kyu hi matlab hum mana karenge jab aap to hamare client ho aapne to hame paise diye to hum to chahte hain na aapki rating achchi rahe
Executive: Maine aapko fir bhi aapke whatsapp pe screenshot bhej diya aapki rating ka kisne di hai kitne star hai maine profile se leke aapka wo screenshot aur usme step bhi aapko samajh mein aa jayenge waha maine profile pe click kiya hua hua hai aur profile ke upar rating and review pe maine click kiya hua hai jisme ye mere ko sari cheeze dikh rahi hai ek baar apna whatsapp open karke isko dekh lijiyega
Customer: Wo to main dekh lunga main thoda sa ye chah raha tha
Executive: Ji bataiye
Customer: Aap log personally bahar ja ke karwa dete to theek rehta yaar
Executive: Sir personally nahi ye koi act koi unknown nahi kar sakta jab tak aap se uski baat nahi hongi wo aapko jab tak connect nahi karega tabhi aap aapke taraf se matlab India Mart ki taraf se usko ek message jata hai ke aap inko kitni rating dena chahenge to aap unse boliya kijiye matlab karna kahin na kahin ye hota hai ki aapko thoda end of the call aapko unse bolna padega rating and review dene ke liye aisa kuch nahi hota ki sir aap koi bhi aake aapko rating deke chala jayega aise nahi hai usko aap se baat karni hi padegi tabhi wo aapko rating and review de sakega
Customer: Nahi wo to call aayega jab na
Executive: Ha ha call aayenge nahi jo aap call karte ho un pe bhi by lead aap jo consume karte ho jo by lead aap jis pe message karte ho ya jo bhi baat karte ho unse bhi aapko karni hai
Customer: Achcha achcha ha uske liye jo aap call karte ho usko bhi
Customer: Link nahi hai kya baat mein jaise link kaise batayenge usko jaise main mobile pe hun
Executive: Ha
Customer: To mobile pe dekhte hain to mobile pe kaise jayenge
Executive: Mobile pe lead manager mein jaiega
Customer: Nahi jaise main ye mobile pe main khada hun mere ko mobile pe usko kehna hai bhai maine baat ki hai aap se to uske paas automatic message jata hai kya
Executive: Jaise hi aap jaoge aapko kuch nahi karna padega dekhiye aapke jab mobile pe aap kaise samjhe jaise aapne mobile pe India Mart open kar liya India Mart mein lead manager open karo
Customer: Main aapko ek minute video video call pe karke dikha du
Customer: Nahi hun nahi na
Executive: Nahi
Executive: Lead manager pe jao mobile pe lead manager kahan aayega
Executive: App open kar liya
Customer: Kar diya
Executive: Usme jaiye aap left ki taraf three lines aa rahi hongi three line left ki taraf us par click kariye
Customer: Kar diya
Executive: Us par click karne ke baad ab dekhiye lead manager likh raha hoga latest by lead ke niche likh raha hoga lead manager
Customer: Hmm
Executive: Ab lead manager jaise hi aapne ye to saala click hi nahi ho raha hai
Executive: Kya nahi ho raha
Customer: Click nahi ho raha click
Executive: Lead manager click kariye lead manager pe ho jayega net nahi aa raha hoga ho sakta hai
Customer: Ha chalo ye ho gaya fir man lo fir kya kare
Executive: Tab us pe koi bhi client jo aapke aa rahe hain samne roshan yadav jo bhi jis jis naam se bhi kuch bhi x y z koi bhi aa rahe hain un par click karo
Customer: Kar diya
Executive: Ab uske andar message khul gaye honge jo bhi aapne usse baat kari hongi
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Ab usme dekhiye ab isi chat mein aapko ek option aa raha hoga view more pe ya fir ask for review call mein dekhna upar ki taraf jahan pe iska naam likh raha hai jahan iska number aa raha hai waha pe ek upar option aa raha hai view more ka
Customer: Ek minute ek minute nahi aa raha isme to
Executive: View more ka option aapko computer pe aayega aap ek cheez bataiye computer pe kab tak pahunch jayenge aap
Customer: Abhi main pahunch ya fir niche dekhiye lekin isme ye sab likha hua to aa raha hai na dekho catalogue link likha hua aa raha hai likha hua aa raha hai thank you for inquiry ye to message hai jo aapne bhej rahe hain ye to aapke message bhi
Customer: Review ka kahan likha hua aa raha hai isme
Executive: Sir review ka jo likha hua aata hai wo upar ki taraf dekho ye to aap niche dekh rahe ho ab upar ki taraf dekho jahan call ke option bane aa rahe honge waha view more likh raha hoga ek jagah pe view more v i e w m o r e view more likh raha hoga
Customer: Nahi likha nahi aa raha koi dikkat nahi to aap jab ek baar office pahunch jaiye tab main aapko video call pe leke achche se samjha dunga theek hai
Customer: Wahi se aata hai rating waise unke paas automatically pahunch jata hai lekin aap bhi mang sakte ho main aapko wo wala tarika bata deta hun aap unko message bhej sakte ho
Executive: Theek hai to sir uske liye jo aapki request hai isko main close kar raha hun maine aapko waise to samjha hi diya hai to close kar do koi dikkat to nahi hai jaise us din maine aapke jo mail pe aapne wo satisfy kiya tha wo jarur kar dena kyuki sabhi close ho payegi nahi to mere liye fir mere manager mujhe datenge ki abhi tak aapne inse baat kyu nahi kari hai theek hai sir
Customer: Theek hai samajh mein aa gaya mujhe is pe teen dot aa raha hai na jo
Executive: Ha ha ha
Customer: Teen dot pe jayenge na ha to teen dot pe jane ke baad mein isme likha hua aata hai ask for review for review bas bas bas wahi hai wahi hai correct ab ekdam sahi jagah pahunch gaye aap
Executive: Jaise hi maine usko click kiya to whatsapp pe turant message pahunch gaya hoga turant message pahunch gaya hoga us pe
Customer: Okay yahi yahi main yahi ha yahi option main samjha raha tha isko main view more bol raha tha aur us aapke three dot bane aa rahe hain
Executive: To aapne aapko bolna chahiye three dot aa gaye hain three dot nahi yaha pe jo computer pe aata hai wo view more likha hua aata hai aur phone mein sir sorry uske liye main shama chaunga phone mein three dot likhe hue aate hain
Customer: Three dot bane hue aate hain review le liya karna theek hai ab to koi dikkat nahi hai
Customer: Nahi koi dikkat nahi hai
Executive: Theek hai
Customer: Main ab aap se connect karunga bilkul kariye
Executive: Theek hai bilkul sir theek hai to abhi jo aapne jo request dali thi usko close kar do ab to koi jarurat nahi hai na
Customer: Ha close
Executive: Jo aapne jo abhi video call ke liye request dali thi ab to aapko abhi to need nahi hai na to usko close kar do na koi dikkat to nahi hai ab
Customer: Bilkul bilkul close kar do
Executive: Theek hai to close kar deta hun aapke paas ek mail aayega us mail pe yes jarur kar dena satisfy jarur kar dena jaise pichli baar kiya tha aapne theek hai
Customer: Theek hai kar dunga ok theek hai ji namaskar sir
Customer: Namaskar
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about review rating process.

- Wants executive to get ratings personally.

Resolution:

- Explained the process of asking for reviews.

- Clarified that fake ratings are not possible.

- Explained how to find the option on mobile.

- Executive offered to explain in detail via video call.

- Customer found the option to ask for review.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will satisfy the mail request.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- rating, reviews, india mart, lead manager, profile
